messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/10/2007 7:43:41 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
gktbdm@... writes:

Oooh, so am I "Karen 1" now??? :) Yeah, I'm from Oz (perhaps that'd
be a good title - Karen from Oz???)


or OzKaren and CaKaren, lol...or, USKaren, lol...Or, Karen 1 and Karen 2, or
Karen Lynn (me)...lol...

I just say your "Britisms" as my mom and I call them and knew you were from
a far away land ;)Oz! How lovely. I'd love to go sometimes, I hear it is a
amazing place, down under. I guess I should call yours "Ozisms!"
